name: Hyperlane
description:
Hyperlane is a prototype that began as an endless rhythm game for mobile with random color changing mechanics. The project is currently on hiatus, and this page will be updated if it is ever picked back up.

Playing Hyperlane is simple enough. Just use the left and right keys or click to move the ship respectively. Connect with your color and dodge the others. Be careful though, the colors change.

Unity and C# Developer: Matt Freeman

Art and UI Design: Beth Glover
